markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157))    **Effect** If your next Strike from the weapon to which the scope is attached hits a creature, the sound of the impact transforms into light, causing the creature to glow until the end of your next turn. A visible creature can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while they glow. If a creature is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), they're concealed while glowing, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39). Because the effect requires a solid impact, [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures are unaffected unless the bullet can deal force damage or has the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune.
name: Interact (auditory, light, transmutation)
